ISSUE.TITLE: Define entry point and enable local install
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently the Annif CLI can only be run using the awkward `python -m annif.cli` command. We should define an entry point via setuptools and make it possible to install it locally, probably using `pipenv install -e .`, so that the command `annif` works directly.
